outputs.output_descr: Strategic framework to advance knowledge management efforts in the UNDP energy sub-practice.  The project will aim to collect information and case studies on energy, develop new knowledge products, and facilitate knowledge transactions as a means to improve UNDP local engagement and expand business practices in the area of energy for sustainable development.

project_descr: Support for the Implementation of Knowledge Management Activities in the Energy Sub-Practice
project_title: Support for the Implementation of Knowledge Management A
